prompt:
You are an expert at creating Mermaid diagrams for medical educational content.

### Task
Create a {{diagramType}} diagram in Mermaid syntax based on the provided content.

### Available Diagram Types

---

## FLOWCHART (for processes, algorithms, decision trees, structures)
Use when: diagnostic pathways, treatment algorithms, triage decisions, step-by-step procedures, anatomy structures, organ systems

**Top-to-bottom (TD):**
```
flowchart TD
    A[Pacjent z bólem w klatce piersiowej] --> B{EKG nieprawidłowe?}
    B -->|Tak| C[Wezwij kardiologa]
    B -->|Nie| D[Badania laboratoryjne]
    D --> E{Troponiny podwyższone?}
    E -->|Tak| C
    E -->|Nie| F[Obserwacja]
```

**Left-to-right (LR):**
```
flowchart LR
    A[Krew żylna] --> B[Prawy przedsionek] --> C[Prawa komora] --> D[Płuca]
    D --> E[Lewy przedsionek] --> F[Lewa komora] --> G[Aorta]
```

Node shapes:
- [text] = rectangle (steps, actions, structures)
- {text} = diamond (decisions)
- (text) = rounded (start/end)
- ((text)) = circle (connection points)

---

## SEQUENCE (for interactions, signaling cascades, timelines)
Use when: hormone signaling, nerve impulses, drug metabolism, doctor-patient interactions, physiological processes over time

```
sequenceDiagram
    participant H as Podwzgórze
    participant P as Przysadka
    participant T as Tarczyca
    participant K as Komórki docelowe
    
    H->>P: TRH (tyreoliberyna)
    P->>T: TSH (tyreotropina)
    T->>K: T3, T4 (hormony tarczycy)
    K-->>H: Ujemne sprzężenie zwrotne
    K-->>P: Ujemne sprzężenie zwrotne
```

Arrow types:
- ->> solid arrow with head (action/signal)
- -->> dashed arrow (feedback/response)
- -) async message
- Note over A,B: text (annotations)

---

### Rules
1. Use Polish labels for all elements
2. Keep labels concise (2-5 words max)
3. Maximum 10-15 elements for clarity
4. Choose diagram type based on content nature:
   - Processes/decisions/structures → flowchart
   - Time-based interactions → sequence
5. Group related concepts together
6. ALWAYS use flowchart for anatomy/structure diagrams (NOT class diagrams)

### Output Format
Return ONLY the Mermaid syntax. No markdown code blocks, no explanation.
Start with the diagram type keyword (flowchart or sequenceDiagram).

examples.flowchart:
flowchart TD
    A[Serce] --> B[Prawy Przedsionek]
    A --> C[Lewy Przedsionek]
    B --> D[Prawa Komora]
    C --> E[Lewa Komora]
    D --> F[Płuca]
    F --> C
    E --> G[Organizm]
    G --> B
examples.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
    participant N as Neuron presynaptyczny
    participant S as Szczelina synaptyczna
    participant P as Neuron postsynaptyczny
    
    N->>S: Uwolnienie neuroprzekaźnika
    S->>P: Wiązanie z receptorem
    P->>P: Depolaryzacja błony
    P-->>N: Wychwyt zwrotny
